GMRES.H

00001 //*****************************************************************
00002 // Iterative template routine -- GMRES
00003 //
00004 // GMRES solves the unsymmetric linear system Ax = b using the 
00005 // Generalized Minimum Residual method
00006 //
00007 // GMRES follows the algorithm described on p. 20 of the 
00008 // SIAM Templates book.
00009 //
00010 // The return value indicates convergence within max_iter (input)
00011 // iterations (0), or no convergence within max_iter iterations (1).
00012 //
00013 // Upon successful return, output arguments have the following values:
00014 //  
00015 //        x  --  approximate solution to Ax = b
00016 // max_iter  --  the number of iterations performed before the
00017 //               tolerance was reached
00018 //      tol  --  the residual after the final iteration
00019 //  
00020 //*****************************************************************
00021 
00022 
00023 template < class Matrix, class Vector >
00024 void 
00025 Update(Vector &x, int k, Matrix &h, Vector &s, Vector v[])
00026 {
00027   Vector y(s);
00028 
00029   // Backsolve:  
00030   for (int i = k; i >= 0; i--) {
00031     y(i) /= h(i,i);
00032     for (int j = i - 1; j >= 0; j--)
00033       y(j) -= h(j,i) * y(i);
00034   }
00035 
00036   for (int j = 0; j <= k; j++)
00037     x += v[j] * y(j);
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 template < class Real >
00042 Real 
00043 abs(Real x)
00044 {
00045   return (x > 0 ? x : -x);
00046 }

00048 
00049 template < class Operator, class Vector, class Preconditioner,
00050            class Matrix, class Real >
00051 int 
00052 GMRES_L(const Operator &A, Vector &x, const Vector &b,
00053       Preconditioner &M, Matrix &H, int &m, int &max_iter,
00054       Real &tol)
00055 {
00056   Real resid;
00057   int i, j = 1, k;
00058   Vector s(m+1), cs(m+1), sn(m+1), w;
00059   
00060   Real normb = norm(M.solve(b));
00061   Vector r = M.solve(b - A * x);
00062   Real beta = norm(r);
00063   
00064   if (normb == 0.0)
00065     normb = 1;
00066   
00067   if ((resid = norm(r) / normb) <= tol) {
00068     tol = resid;
00069     max_iter = 0;
00070     return 0;
00071   }
00072 
00073   Vector *v = new Vector[m+1];
00074 
00075   while (j <= max_iter) {
00076     v[0] = r * (1.0 / beta);    // ??? r / beta
00077     s = 0.0;
00078     s(0) = beta;
00079     
00080     for (i = 0; i < m && j <= max_iter; i++, j++) {
00081       w = M.solve(A * v[i]);
00082       for (k = 0; k <= i; k++) {
00083         H(k, i) = dot(w, v[k]);
00084         w -= H(k, i) * v[k];
00085       }
00086       H(i+1, i) = norm(w);
00087       v[i+1] = w * (1.0 / H(i+1, i)); // ??? w / H(i+1, i)
00088 
00089       for (k = 0; k < i; k++)
00090         ApplyPlaneRotation(H(k,i), H(k+1,i), cs(k), sn(k));
00091       
00092       GeneratePlaneRotation(H(i,i), H(i+1,i), cs(i), sn(i));
00093       ApplyPlaneRotation(H(i,i), H(i+1,i), cs(i), sn(i));
00094       ApplyPlaneRotation(s(i), s(i+1), cs(i), sn(i));
00095       
00096       if ((resid = abs(s(i+1)) / normb) < tol) {
00097         Update(x, i, H, s, v);
00098         tol = resid;
00099         max_iter = j;
00100         delete [] v;
00101         return 0;
00102       }
00103     }
00104     Update(x, m - 1, H, s, v);
00105     r = M.solve(b - A * x);
00106     beta = norm(r);
00107     if ((resid = beta / normb) < tol) {
00108       tol = resid;
00109       max_iter = j;
00110       delete [] v;
00111       return 0;
00112     }
00113   }
00114   
00115   tol = resid;
00116   delete [] v;
00117   return 1;
00118 }

00120 
00121 template < class Operator, class Vector, class Preconditioner,
00122            class Matrix, class Real >
00123 int 
00124 GMRES_R(const Operator &A, Vector &x, const Vector &b,
00125       Preconditioner &M, Matrix &H, int &m, int &max_iter,
00126       Real &tol)
00127 {
00128   Real resid;
00129   int i, j = 1, k;
00130   Vector s(m+1), cs(m+1), sn(m+1), w;
00131   
00132   Real normb = norm(b);
00133   Vector r = b - A * x;
00134   Real beta = norm(r);
00135   
00136   if (normb == 0.0)
00137     normb = 1;
00138 
00139   if ((resid = norm(r) / normb) <= tol) {
00140     tol = resid;
00141     max_iter = 0;
00142     return 0;
00143   }
00144 
00145   Vector *v = new Vector[m+1];
00146   Vector *w1 = new Vector[m+1];
00147 
00148   while (j <= max_iter) {
00149     v[0] = r * (1.0 / beta);    // ??? r / beta
00150     s = 0.0;
00151     s(0) = beta;
00152     
00153     for (i = 0; i < m && j <= max_iter; i++, j++) {
00154       w1[i] = M.solve(v[i]);
00155       w = A * w1[i];
00156       for (k = 0; k <= i; k++) {
00157         H(k, i) = dot(w, v[k]);
00158         w -= H(k, i) * v[k];
00159       }
00160       H(i+1, i) = norm(w);
00161       v[i+1] = w * (1.0 / H(i+1, i)); // ??? w / H(i+1, i)
00162 
00163       for (k = 0; k < i; k++)
00164         ApplyPlaneRotation(H(k,i), H(k+1,i), cs(k), sn(k));
00165       
00166       GeneratePlaneRotation(H(i,i), H(i+1,i), cs(i), sn(i));
00167       ApplyPlaneRotation(H(i,i), H(i+1,i), cs(i), sn(i));
00168       ApplyPlaneRotation(s(i), s(i+1), cs(i), sn(i));
00169       
00170       if ((resid = abs(s(i+1)) / normb) < tol) {
00171         Update(x, i, H, s, w1);
00172         tol = resid;
00173         max_iter = j;
00174         delete [] v; delete []w1;
00175         return 0;
00176       }
00177     }
00178     Update(x, m - 1, H, s, w1);
00179     r = b - A * x;
00180     beta = norm(r);
00181 
00182     if ((resid = beta / normb) < tol) {
00183       tol = resid;
00184       max_iter = j;
00185       delete [] v;  delete []w1;
00186       return 0;
00187     }
00188   }
00189   
00190   tol = resid;
00191   delete [] v; delete [] w1;
00192   return 1;
00193 }

00196 #include <math.h>

00198 
00199 template<class Real> 
00200 void GeneratePlaneRotation(Real &dx, Real &dy, Real &cs, Real &sn)
00201 {
00202   if (dy == 0.0) {
00203     cs = 1.0;
00204     sn = 0.0;
00205   } else if (abs(dy) > abs(dx)) {
00206     Real temp = dx / dy;
00207     sn = 1.0 / sqrt( 1.0 + temp*temp );
00208     cs = temp * sn;
00209   } else {
00210     Real temp = dy / dx;
00211     cs = 1.0 / sqrt( 1.0 + temp*temp );
00212     sn = temp * cs;
00213   }
00214 }
00215 
00216 
00217 template<class Real> 
00218 void ApplyPlaneRotation(Real &dx, Real &dy, Real &cs, Real &sn)
00219 {
00220   Real temp  =  cs * dx + sn * dy;
00221   dy = -sn * dx + cs * dy;
00222   dx = temp;
00223 }
